headline: Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE:TPR): Looking Forward to Beat Street Estimates
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Tapestry, Inc. (NYSE:TPR) on ValueInvestorsClub by baileyb906. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TPR. The company’s shares were trading at $65.30 when this thesis was published, vs. the closing price of $85.42 on Feb 28. TPR provides luxury accessories and branded lifestyle products in […]
